content: Sassoli: Much of #Russia’s conduct in parts of #Ukraine it occupied before and after February 24, including through the so-called self-proclaimed “republics” of Donetsk and Luhansk, violates international humanitarian law of military occupation. csce.gov/international-…

content: Sassoli: Not conceivable that so many civilian objects – residential buildings, hospitals, cultural property, schools, etc. – would have been damaged or destroyed if #Russia had respected its humanitarian law obligations. csce.gov/international-…

content: .@OSCE report expert Marco Sassoli: Violations of international humanitarian law occurred on the Ukrainian as well as on the Russian side…the violations committed by #Russia, however, are by far larger in scale and nature. csce.gov/international-… https://t.co/cDNu86aVbN

text: report expert marco sassoli violations international humanitarian law occurred ukrainian well russian sidethe violations committed russia however far larger scale nature cscegovinternational
